articles.description: Income Tax Department on Monday said that more than 3 crore returns have been filed through e-filing portal till date for the financial year 2021-22. Over 2.3 crore Income Tax Returns (ITRs) were filed till July 20 for the financial year 2021-22.
articles.content:

articles.description: Lovlina Borgohain: तोक्यो ओलिंपिक में भारत के लिए ब्रॉन्ज मेडल जीतने वाली महिला बॉक्सर लवलीना बोरगोहेन की शिकायत पर खेल मंत्रालय हरकत में आ चुका है। मंत्रालय ने इस मामले को ओलिंपिक संघ में उठाया और जल्द से जल्द लवलीना की शिकायत को दूर करने का आग्रह किया है।

articles.description: Reliance Jio, Bharti Airtel, Vodafone Idea and a unit of billionaire Gautam Adani's flagship Adani Enterprises are set to participate in the 5G auctions. The industry expects spectrum to be sold near the reserve prices, and the bidding to last about two days.

articles.title: Growing up without parents' care, Bihar girl is state topper in CBSE Class X
articles.description: Talking about Sreeja's struggles, she says: "Her father left the girl after my daughter's death. We have not been in touch or seen him since then. He got married again and now he must be regretting after seeing his daughter's board result."
